PKN.PR.long_name: Polski Koncern Naftowy ORLEN Spólka Akcyjna
PKN.PR.summary: Polski Koncern Naftowy ORLEN SpÃ³lka Akcyjna processes, refines, and markets crude oil. The company operates in through three segments: Downstream, Retail, and Upstream. It offers motor gasolines, diesel oils, fuel oils, light heating oils, liquefied gas, biofuels, bunker fuels, and aviation fuels; read, industrial, modifies, and mutligrade bitumen; base, motor, gea, hydraulic, and industrial oils; oils agriculture, car lubricants, and lubricants; and refining products, such as solvents, slack waxes, waxes, sulfur, kerosene, industrial grade glycerin, paraffins, alkylate, reformate, and isomerate. The company also provides ethylene and propylene; polyethylene and polypropylene; artificial fertilizers comprising nitrogen fertilizers, liquid ammonia, CANWIL, ammonium nitrate, ammonium sulfate, soda lye, caustic soda, and sodium hypochlorite; petrochemicals consisting of acetone, process butadiene, ethyl tertiary-butyl ether, polymerization ethylene, process phenol, glycol, terephthalic acid PTA, petrollent, ethylene polyglycols, polymerization propylene, and liquid ethylene oxide; aromatic hydrocarbons, which includes raffinate, paraxylene, benzene, and benzene-toulene fraction; and polyvinyl chloride (PVC), PVC granulates, PVC based mixes, PVC sheets, brake and other fluids, and toluene. In addition, it offers iodised and pickling salts, salt pellets and briquettes, sodium chloride, animal feed salt, waste salt, industrial-grade brine, table salt, salt dust, and salt separated; and fuel cards, LPF and ad-blue flow meters, service station and control systems, and car care cosmetics and chemicals, as well as generates electricity and heat. Further, the company engages in the production, distribution, and sale of grease oils and maintenance liquids; liquid fuels trade; exploration of hydrocarbon deposits; and extraction of natural gas. It operates 2,836 fuel stations. Polski Koncern Naftowy ORLEN SpÃ³lka Akcyjna was founded in 1999 and is based in Plock, Poland.
